Request Demo

Create your collaborative Digital Campus with myday

Simple to integrate, the myday portal and mobile app improves learner engagement, satisfaction & results!

Request Demo
watch overview video

What is myday?

myday is a customisable Digital Campus that collects, displays and pushes information from disparate IT systems.  The myday platform leverages all existing IT investments by bringing them together onto one customisable tiled interface. Using the adaptable features, the platform allows you to execute targeted communications empowering your institute to recruit, engage, connect and retain both students and staff.

Students want the ability to manage their lives by having access to all relevant information at any given time, from any location. For many, this focus on the student experience is a key consideration when choosing where to study. myday enables students to be better connected even when on the go, anytime, anywhere, making their academic experience better!

See Features

Dashboards

myday presents an easy to use and intuitive interface which is consistent across the myday platform and suite of products

Dashboards

Native Mobile App

A native mobile app available in the stores for all myday subscribers. Access a full myday experience on the move, online or offline

Native Mobile App

Built In The Cloud

myday is built in the cloud enabling quick deployment, global scalability, frequent updates and a platform you can rely on

Built In The Cloud

Push Notifications

Push notifications enable your organisation to deliver key messages through myday to your users on the web or on the mobile device. Your communications can be targeted and personalised.

Push Notifications

Personalised Branding

Your identity is important to you and your students—myday embraces this and allows you to apply your logo, colour scheme and even create your own personalised mobile app.

Personalised Branding

Request a demo

Would you like to try out myday for free to see how it can benefit your institution? Click on the link below and we’ll get in touch!

Request Demo

"We could see the benefits of myday's aggregating capabilities. myday simply pulls together all the information a student needs to engage with."

Richard Corn , Head of IT Infrastructure Bishop Grosseteste University

"The look and feel and ease of use of myday will enable us to greatly improve learner experience."

Marie Stock , Assistant Principal The Manchester College

"myday's capability to bring together all the information a student needs and present it to them in a way they wanted, delivered to any web-enabled device, was just what we were looking for."

Yves Bozzo-Rey , Online Services Manager City of Westminster College

"We have received excellent feedback from our 5, 000 users, who love the interface and presentation of the myday system."

Stephen Harvey , Head of Digital Campus Services Arts University Bournemouth

Our Partners

Our mission

To develop world leading internet and mobile cloud based solutions to further enhance the teaching and learning experience.

Request Demo

Request Demo

Create your collaborative Digital Campus with myday

Simple to integrate, the myday portal and mobile app improves learner engagement, satisfaction & results!

Request Demo
watch overview video

What is myday?

myday is a customisable Digital Campus that collects, displays and pushes information from disparate IT systems.  The myday platform leverages all existing IT investments by bringing them together onto one customisable tiled interface. Using the adaptable features, the platform allows you to execute targeted communications empowering your institute to recruit, engage, connect and retain both students and staff.

Students want the ability to manage their lives by having access to all relevant information at any given time, from any location. For many, this focus on the student experience is a key consideration when choosing where to study. myday enables students to be better connected even when on the go, anytime, anywhere, making their academic experience better!

See Features

Dashboards

myday presents an easy to use and intuitive interface which is consistent across the myday platform and suite of products

Dashboards

Native Mobile App

A native mobile app available in the stores for all myday subscribers. Access a full myday experience on the move, online or offline

Native Mobile App

Built In The Cloud

myday is built in the cloud enabling quick deployment, global scalability, frequent updates and a platform you can rely on

Built In The Cloud

Push Notifications

Push notifications enable your organisation to deliver key messages through myday to your users on the web or on the mobile device. Your communications can be targeted and personalised.

Push Notifications

Personalised Branding

Your identity is important to you and your students—myday embraces this and allows you to apply your logo, colour scheme and even create your own personalised mobile app.

Personalised Branding

Request a demo

Would you like to try out myday for free to see how it can benefit your institution? Click on the link below and we’ll get in touch!

Request Demo

"We could see the benefits of myday's aggregating capabilities. myday simply pulls together all the information a student needs to engage with."

Richard Corn , Head of IT Infrastructure Bishop Grosseteste University

"The look and feel and ease of use of myday will enable us to greatly improve learner experience."

Marie Stock , Assistant Principal The Manchester College

"myday's capability to bring together all the information a student needs and present it to them in a way they wanted, delivered to any web-enabled device, was just what we were looking for."

Yves Bozzo-Rey , Online Services Manager City of Westminster College

"We have received excellent feedback from our 5, 000 users, who love the interface and presentation of the myday system."

Stephen Harvey , Head of Digital Campus Services Arts University Bournemouth

Our Partners

Our mission

To develop world leading internet and mobile cloud based solutions to further enhance the teaching and learning experience.

Request Demo
